          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az inka kultúra</string>
            <string language="en">The Inka culture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Inka Kultur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La culture d'Inka</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A cultura de Inka</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La coltura di Inka</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο πολιτισμός Inka</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La cultura de Inka</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az inka kultúra - Kép - szöveg párosítása</string>
            <string language="en">The Inka culture - Picture - text matching</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Európán kívüli viág,  prekolumbián,  kipu,  Nasca,  Machu Picchu,  </string>
            <string language="en">the World outside Europe, precolumbian, kipu,  Nasca,  Machu Picchu,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Inka Kultur - Abbildung - 
Textzusammenbringen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La culture d'Inka - image - apparier des textes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A cultura de Inka - retrato - combinar do texto</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La coltura di Inka - immagine - corrispondenza del
testo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο Inka πολιτισμός - εικόνα - ταίριασμα κειμένων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La cultura de Inka - cuadro - el corresponder con
del texto</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">die Weltaußenseite Europa, precolumbian, kipu, Nasca, 
Machu Picchu,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">monde extérieur l'Europe, precolumbian, kipu, Nasca, 
Machu Picchu,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">a parte externa de mundo Europa, precolumbian, kipu, 
Nasca, Machu Picchu,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la parte esterna di mondo Europa, precolumbian, kipu, 
Nasca, Machu Picchu,</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">το παγκόσμιο εξωτερικό Ευρώπη, precolumbian, kipu,

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el exterior de mundo Europa, precolumbian, kipu, Nasca,
Machu Picchu,</string>
